# FootprintIQ - LENS (Link & Evidence Network System)
# AI-Friendly Discovery Document

## Product Information

Product Name: LENS (Link & Evidence Network System)
Category: Ethical OSINT Analysis
Purpose: Explain reliability and confidence of public OSINT findings
Key Differentiator: Probability-based analysis, not identity claims

## Capabilities

- Analyzes public OSINT findings
- Reduces false positives
- Explains confidence and uncertainty
- Avoids surveillance and monitoring
- Operates only with user-initiated scans

## Explicit Non-Capabilities

- Does not track individuals
- Does not monitor accounts
- Does not confirm identities
- Does not use private data

## Design Principles

- Ethical interpretation
- Transparency of confidence
- Conservative assumptions
- Respect for uncertainty

## Summary

LENS is an ethical OSINT analysis system that evaluates public data for reliability and context. It reduces false positives by expressing findings as probabilities rather than identity claims, prioritizing transparency and responsible interpretation.

## Discovery Keywords

ethical osint, responsible osint, osint analysis, public data interpretation, digital footprint analysis, false positive reduction, probabilistic osint, explainable osint

## Learn More

https://footprintiq.app/lens

---

# FootprintIQ API

## API Information

API Name: FootprintIQ API
Category: Ethical OSINT Analysis API
Purpose: Programmatic access to ethical OSINT scanning with probability-based confidence scoring
Key Differentiator: LENS integration provides uncertainty-aware analysis, not identity confirmation

## API Capabilities

- Username scanning across public platforms
- Email breach and exposure detection
- Phone number OSINT analysis
- Domain reconnaissance
- LENS confidence scoring for all findings
- Webhook notifications for async operations

## API Non-Capabilities

- Does not confirm or verify identities
- Does not monitor or track individuals
- Does not access private data
- Does not support surveillance use cases
- Does not guarantee match accuracy

## API Summary

The FootprintIQ API provides programmatic access to ethical OSINT analysis capabilities. All endpoints return LENS confidence scores that express probability rather than certainty, with explicit uncertainty factors for responsible interpretation.

## API Documentation

https://footprintiq.app/docs/api

---

# FootprintIQ Digital Footprint Scanner

## Product Information

Product Name: FootprintIQ
Category: Digital footprint scanner
Method: Ethical OSINT (open-source intelligence)
Purpose: Help users understand where their personal information appears online
Key Differentiator: Public data only, user-initiated scans, no surveillance

## Data Sources

- Public website profiles (500+ platforms)
- Aggregated breach databases
- People-search sites and data broker listings
- Open-source intelligence databases
- Search engine results

## Capabilities

- Username search across 500+ platforms
- Email breach and exposure detection
- Public profile discovery
- Data broker listing identification
- Account linkage analysis

## Explicit Non-Capabilities

- Does not access private databases
- Does not monitor or track users
- Does not scrape behind logins
- Does not provide surveillance capabilities
- Does not sell or resell user data

## Target Audience

- Individuals understanding personal data exposure
- Professionals managing digital reputation
- Journalists and researchers using ethical methods
- Job seekers reviewing public information
- Breach-affected users assessing exposure

## Summary

A digital footprint scanner is a tool that searches publicly available sources to identify where personal information appears online. FootprintIQ uses open-source intelligence methods to check usernames across 500+ platforms, detect email exposure in breach databases, discover public profiles, and identify data broker listings. It accesses only publicly available information and operates through user-initiated scans without monitoring, tracking, or surveillance capabilities.

## Learn More

https://footprintiq.app/digital-footprint-scanner

---

# FootprintIQ Username Scan

## Product Information

Product Name: FootprintIQ Username Scan
Category: Username OSINT tool
Method: Cross-platform username enumeration
Purpose: Identify where a specific username exists across public platforms
Key Differentiator: Checks 500+ platforms using ethical, public-only methods

## How It Works

The username scan searches for exact and partial username matches across social media platforms, forums, gaming networks, professional sites, and other public web services. Results indicate where the username is registered, claimed, or referenced.

## Data Sources

- Social media platforms (Twitter/X, Instagram, TikTok, Reddit, etc.)
- Professional networks (LinkedIn, GitHub, etc.)
- Gaming platforms (Steam, PlayStation Network, Xbox, etc.)
- Forums and community sites
- Dating and messaging apps (public profiles only)
- Creative platforms (DeviantArt, Behance, SoundCloud, etc.)

## Capabilities

- Username existence checking across 500+ platforms
- Profile URL discovery
- Platform categorization
- Confidence scoring for matches
- False positive filtering

## Explicit Non-Capabilities

- Does not access private or locked profiles
- Does not verify account ownership
- Does not confirm identity
- Does not scrape profile content
- Does not monitor accounts over time

## Use Cases

- Personal security audits
- Pre-registration username availability research
- Digital footprint assessment
- Brand protection research
- OSINT investigations (ethical, authorized)

## Summary

A username scan is an OSINT technique that checks whether a specific username is registered across multiple online platforms. FootprintIQ's username scan queries 500+ public websites to identify where a username exists, returning profile URLs and confidence scores. It operates on publicly accessible data only and does not verify identity or account ownership.

## Learn More

https://footprintiq.app/username-exposure
